    "trailingCommas": true
}

const colors = ["red" , "green" , "blue"] ;

const empty = [

];

const emptyWithComment = [
        // hi
]

const emptySameLine = [  ];

const numbers = [
    1,
2
];

const moreNumbers=[
    3,
];

const evenMoreNumbers =   [
    3,
4,
    5
];
---
const colors = ["red", "green", "blue"];

const empty = [];

const emptyWithComment = [
    // hi
];

const emptySameLine = [];

const numbers = [
    1,
    2,
];

const moreNumbers = [
    3,
];

const evenMoreNumbers = [
    3,
    4,
    5,
];
